column1: Great news from Moderna that their vaccine is 94.5% effective! Together with Pfizer we are making great progress towards defeating COVID-19. Thank you to @realDonaldTrump and all those who have worked to make Operation Warp Speed such a success.  https://t.co/R7F6PYjpa0

Great news the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine is 90% effective. ‘UGE! Thank you to @realDonaldTrump for Operation Warp Speed. The President said what he was going to do and he did it...Again! https://t.co/QPbQ6W3RL7

As we continue our recovery from COVID-19 it is more important than ever to support small businesses. In Congress I will continue to advocate for their needs ensuring they are well-positioned to safely reopen create jobs and reignite our economy. https://t.co/us2wv5FKJv

It is being reported that Speaker Pelosi will not accept any COVID-19 relief proposal that contains liability protections which are essential for higher education institutions and small businesses. She is prioritizing special interest groups over the American people.
ICYMI I discussed the President's COVID-19 diagnosis this afternoon with @TeamCavuto on Fox Business. https://t.co/I48Wyy6MuF

Instead of working on targeted bipartisan legislation that would help our nation and economy continue to recover from the coronavirus crisis Speaker Pelosi put forward a messaging bill tonight that has no chance of ever becoming law. https://t.co/YMb3ju7BsX
ICYMI I joined @AftertheBell today to discuss the potential of a new COVID-19 relief package in Congress. https://t.co/NlH3UQgT62

On Labor Day we recognize the strength of the American worker who continues to make America great. As a nation we have overcome many challenges. Together we will once again rise to the occasion to defeat the coronavirus and continue a Great American Comeback! https://t.co/QJnlL4rg7R

.@realDonaldTrump announced the @US_FDA has authorized use of convalescent plasma for treatment on those who are hospitalized with COVID-19. This therapeutic holds great promise. Once I test negative I look forward to becoming a plasma machine!  https://t.co/cNH6zjKEvk

The Coronavirus Food Assistance Program has provided $545 million in direct payments to farmers in one week including $15 million to our hardworking PA farmers! The Farm Service Agency is accepting applications until August 28.  Learn more at https://t.co/kSSfADYpAG

Yesterday I introduced the Coronavirus Swindlers Crooks and Manipulators (SCAM) Act a bipartisan effort to crack down on the rising number of scams during the #COVID19 pandemic.  For the full press release please visit: https://t.co/4I5epCbUmH https://t.co/rR7V3ftMDn

(1/4) Even on Easter Sunday the mainstream media was trying to convince the public that @realDonaldTrump is to blame for #COVID19. The facts tell a different story. On 1/23 the @who said #COVID19 was "not a global health threat."

(1/2) Yesterday the House passed $7.8 billion in emergency supplemental appropriations for the U.S. response to the coronavirus. This bill provides critical funding for federal state and local officials to combat the threat posed by this disease.
